title: Entity overview
contents:
mode_edit

Entity overviewlink

Entity State adapter for managing record collections.

Entity provides an API to manipulate and query entity collections.

  • Reduces boilerplate for creating reducers that manage a collection of models.
  • Provides performant CRUD operations for managing entity collections.
  • Extensible type-safe adapters for selecting entity information.

Installationlink

Detailed installation instructions can be found on the Installation page.

Important!link

The Entity State adapter is only compatible with plain javascript objects. This means, for example, you cannot use it to store ES6 class instances. See issue #976. Unfortunately for you, the linked issue does not explain why we made this decision.
